full_text:
Probable Cause Affidavit
Palm Beach Police Department
Agency ORI# FLO 500600

As the interview was concluded and Robson was being taken home, a tape recorder was placed within the vehicle to record any conversations made within the vehicle. During the drive back to her home, Robson made the comment "I'm like a Heidi Fliess". (Hollywood Madam who sent girls to clients for sexual favors in California). Robson was dropped off at her house without incident.

On November 7, 2005, I made contact with _____________ at her home. During a sworn taped statement _____________ stated she met Jeffrey Epstein through Haley Robson. Robson would approach females who wished to work for him. _____________ stated she was offered to work for him but declined. _____________ explained that "work" means give massages. She was asked about any formal training in providing massages which she said no. _____________ said she accompanied Robson and other females who taken to Epstein's house to provide massages. She further stated she had been to the house approximately 4 or 5 times in the past year. Each time any girl was taken to Epsteins house, they were previously told they would have to provide a massage, possibly naked. It was also told that should Epstein require them to do anything extra, and they were not comfortable with the request, just to tell him and he would stop. _____________ stated Robson received $200.00 for each girl she brought over to massage Jeffrey Epstein. When I asked which girl appeared to be the youngest, she replied, the victim, _____________ stated she looked really young, fifteen years old at the most. _____________ further stated she did not know the victim personally. _____________ stated she only went to the house to accompany Robson.

As Robson knowing the age of the victim, solicited the victim to commit a lewd a lascivious act and based on the above facts, I have sufficient probable cause to arrest Haley Robson for Lewd and Lascivious Acts to a victim under the age of 16.

The foregoing instrument was sworn to or affirmed before me this 20 day of September, 2005 by Det. Joe Recarey ,who is personally known to me.

State of Florida
County of Palm Beach

Signature/Arresting Officer

Date: 09/20/2005

Signature of Police Officer (F.S.S. 117.10)

Page 1 of 4
07/26/17 Page 35 of 135
PPublic Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031208

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or sensitive information. The document is a probable cause affidavit related to a case involving Jeffrey Epstein and Haley Robson.
